list_definition.mean_english: bảng ghi tỉ số, bảng ghi điểm
list_definition.definition: a usually large board on which the score is shown at a cricket match, a quiz-programme/program etc

list_ex_of_english: I am pleased by the fact that further scoreboards are being planned.
A single annual scoreboard would create a strategic mechanism for evaluating progress in policies and any adjustments deemed necessary.
We have that support but it is not sufficient to chalk it up on a scoreboard.
The scoreboard will be our eyes and ears alerting us to problem hotspots.
It should be based on the use of an indicative and transparent scoreboard, comprising indicative thresholds, combined with economic judgment.
I agree that the scoreboard results need to be widely communicated.
I feel there are inadequacies in the scoreboard itself.
I am very pleased to hear that much progress has already been made following the publication of the single market scoreboard.
